testSummary.notes: All implemented tests pass. Phase 6 added 214 new passing tests for handler system verification, execution, sandbox isolation, egress control, first-party handlers, registry API, and E2E handler lifecycle.

phase6NewTests.mockHandler: tests/fixtures/handlers/mockHandler.ts - Mock handler package utilities and fixtures

notes: Phase 6 complete. Added comprehensive test coverage for handler system: (1) Handler Verification - Ed25519 signature verification, manifest validation, WASM module validation; (2) Handler Execution - basic execution, input/output validation, state management, error scenarios; (3) Sandbox Isolation - memory limits, CPU limits, filesystem isolation, network isolation; (4) Egress Control - allowlist validation, rate limiting, request validation, IP blocking; (5) First-Party Handlers - messaging (send text), profile updates, connection invites with business logic validation; (6) Registry API - list handlers with pagination/filtering/sorting, upload handler with versioning; (7) E2E Handler Lifecycle - complete install→execute→update→uninstall flow with state persistence. Tests use mock handler packages simulating WASM module behavior based on vault-manager architecture documentation.
